answers.answer: Hello,Ejaculation without erection can be due to stress and anxiety, unrealistic sexual expectations, negative feelings about non performance,smoking, alcohol and sometimes illicit drugs and medical conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid conditions, poor circulation, low testosterone, depression, spinal cord injury, nerve damage (for example, from prostate surgery), or neurologic disorders (such as multiple sclerosis or Parkinson's disease).I sincerely advise you to consult a urologist and get it evaluated as treatment depends on the cause.I hope it helps.Take care and regards.
